subject: Part Time Job Offer ( Work From Home And Get Paid )
body:
Dear Sir/Ma,

This is to introduce our company Briscoat Global Manufacturing Company
United kingdom Limited to United states and Canada. The company was establised
in 1946 with its first branch in Southampton and also started as a sole
business until 1949 when the company opened an opportunity for
partnership. Today, the company is proud to inform the general public that we have more
than 3000 employees all over Africa, Asia, The Antartica and
Eastern Europe.

OUR AREA OF SPECIALISATION:

Briscoat Global Mfg. Co., Ltd., a specialist in the production of
variety of Rubber belts such as power transmission belts, conveyor belts and
industrial rubber products etc,

OUR AIM/VISION:

We aim to be the best and the best in employing the under-priviledged
people and also the unemployed individuals all over the world and also to
ensure the provision of Responsibility, Creativity and Quality Policy.
We offer superior products & services to meet customer's satisfactory at
reasonable prices and keep running forward.

We have reached big sales volume of industrial rubber products in the
Unted Kingdom and asia and now trying to penetrate the United States and Canada market. Quite soon we
shall open representative offices or authorized sales outlets in the Unted states
and therefore we are currently looking for people who will assist
us in establishing a new distribution network there.The fact is that
despite the United states market is new for us we already have regular clients also
speaks for itself.


WHAT WE REQUIRE OF YOU:

The international money transfer tax for legal entities (companies) in
united Kingdom is very high, This is of unfavourable condition to the company.

The tax for international money
transfer made by a private individual is 7% .That's why we need you! We
need agents to receive payment for our industrial rubber products from our customers

and to resend the money to us via our bank account in
United kingdom or Western union while the tax shall be 7% intead of 25% which will absolutely
favour our company.


JOB DESCRIPTION

1. Reciept of payments made by Clients either by cheques, Balance
Transfer or bank to Bank Electronic transfer

2. Cash Payments at your Bank

3. Deduction of 10% made payable to employee as commission on each
payment processed.

4. Forwarding the balance after the deduction of 10% commission to
offices which shall be provided by us as soon as the fund becomes
available.

YOUR TOTAL EARNINGS:
10% from each operation! For instance: you receive 5000 pounds via any
means of payment listed above on our behalf, your commission will $500
pounds (10% of 5000 Dollars ) for yourself on each transaction. At the beginning your
commission will equal 10%, though later it will increase up to 12%!

The more transaction you make, the more your earnings and also the tendency of increasing your commission rate.

ADVANTAGES:

You do not have to go out as you will work as an independent contractor
right from your home office. Your job is absolutely legal.
You can earn up to 3000-4000 Dollars monthly depending on time spent on
this job. You do not need any capital to start. You can do this
conviniently without leaving or affecting your present Job. The employee who
make more effort and work harder has strong possibility of becoming a
branch manager at any of our branches nearer to your neighbourhood.
Anyway, We are proud to say our employees never been reduced due to our
excellent work condition.

ELIGIBILITY:
Interested person must be at least 18 years or older legally capable
responsible ready to work 3-4 hours per week.with PC knowledge e-mail and
internet experience (minimal).

Kindly contact us on briscoatadmin@sify.com to enable you know more about our company.

Best Regards,
Admin/Human Resources Manager,

Raymond George
